summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 24, 2019. It documents routine facility operations, staff leave, and inmate statuses, most notably listing inmate Jeffrey Epstein (476318-054) as being on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
Local Hospice (location of another inmate with USMS guards)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is documented as being on Suicide Watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York on July 24, 2019.
Epstein is listed with an 'inmate companion' while on Suicide Watch.
The report indicates ongoing 'Fire Watch' procedures and notes that some security doors on 5-South were inoperative.
The report details routine inmate movements including new admissions, releases, and admissions to the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
This administrative document was created one day before Epstein's death on July 25, 2019, providing a snapshot of his status and facility conditions at that time.
